snippet: On Monday, the Internet radio service sued Ascap, one of the United States' major performing rights organizations, to lower royalty rates.
abstract: On Monday, the Internet radio service sued Ascap, one of the United States' major performing rights organizations, to lower royalty rates.

headline.main: Pandora Opens a New Front in Its Royalty War
